description: If you're just getting off of work and are looking to get some shots up in some solitude, Hawkins park provides a clean, well-maintained court with good grip for your outdoor sneakers.
name: Morse Park

directions.laguna: From franklin and laguna blvd, make a right on franklin towards franklin high, left on elk grove blvd, right on fire poppy drive, left on Bellaterra, park will be on your right.
directions.eg: From laguna west, continue on Elk Grove Blvd toward Raleys shopping center, right on fire poppy, left on Bellaterra and park will be on your right.
